mapper.select: select /* com.whataulsan.whale.touristSite.mapper.TouristSiteMapper.getWhaleRegionList */ region.region_code, region.region_name, region.tourist_site_uid from ulsan_tour.region

select /* com.whataulsan.whale.touristSite.mapper.TouristSiteMapper.getTouristSiteList */ tourist_site.tourist_site_uid, tourist_site.tourist_site_name from ulsan_tour.tourist_site where tourist_site.region_code = #{regionCode}

select /* com.whataulsan.whale.touristSite.mapper.TouristSiteMapper.getTouristSite */ tourist_site.tourist_site_uid, tourist_site.tourist_site_name, tourist_site.region_code, region.region_name, tourist_site.tourist_site_addr, tourist_site.represent_img_file_id from ulsan_tour.tourist_site inner join ulsan_tour.region on region.region_code = tourist_site.region_code where tourist_site.tourist_site_uid = #{turlsSn}

select /* com.whataulsan.whale.touristSite.mapper.TouristSiteMapper.getTouristSiteTagList */ tourist_site_tag.tourist_site_uid, tourist_site_tag.tag_uid, tag.tag_name, tourist_site_tag.sort_seq from ulsan_tour.tourist_site_tag inner join ulsan_tour.tag on tourist_site_tag.tag_uid = tag.tag_uid where tourist_site_tag.tourist_site_uid = #{turlsSn} order by tourist_site_tag.sort_seq

select /* com.whataulsan.whale.touristSite.mapper.TouristSiteMapper.getRecommendedTouristSiteList */ tourist_site.tourist_site_uid, tourist_site.tourist_site_name, tourist_site.tourist_site_addr, tourist_site.represent_img_file_id from ulsan_tour.tourist_site
